domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @SteveFDA Wow. Just wow. You threw the safety of the American people under the bus for your ignorant boss. How does it feel to not have our backs? A sorry state of affairs when you won't correct a falsehood. #COVID19 #StephenHahn
